channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国开发商债权人计划首次起诉国有股东索要会费
item.description: A group of offshore creditors of China South City is set to file a lawsuit against the debt-laden developer's biggest state-owned shareholder for dues, four sources said, in what would be the first such case in the crisis-hit property sector.翻译:四位消息人士称，华南城的一批境外债权人将针对负债累累的开发商最大的国有股东提起诉讼，要求缴纳会费，这将是受危机打击的房地产行业中的首例此类案件。
item.author: Yu Xie

item.title: 中国商飞飞机买家文莱盖洛普航空计划于年底推出
item.description: Brunei-based airline startup GallopAir hopes to start operations by the end of 2024 should Brunei's aviation regulator approve the regional jet made by Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC it wants to fly in time, the carrier's chief executive said.翻译:总部位于文莱的航空公司初创公司 GallopAir 首席执行官表示，如果文莱航空监管机构批准中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞制造的支线飞机能够及时试飞，该公司希望在 2024 年底前开始运营。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Brenda Goh

item.title: 立法者称台湾之行讨论了美国对乌克兰援助计划的命运
item.description: A stalled U.S. bill on military aid to Ukraine which will also help fund weapons for Taiwan was discussed this week during a visit to Taipei by U.S. lawmakers, two of the participants said on Friday.翻译:两名与会者周五表示，美国议员本周访问台北期间讨论了一项陷入僵局的美国向乌克兰提供军事援助的法案，该法案也将为台湾的武器提供资金。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大流行后的复苏激发了新加坡航展的强劲出席率和希望
item.description: As the bustling trade portion of the first fully post-pandemic Singapore Airshow wound down on Friday, exhibitors and delegates said they were optimistic for the aviation industry despite suppliers' struggles to keep up with the rebound in travel demand.翻译:随着疫情后首届新加坡航展熙熙攘攘的贸易部分于周五结束，参展商和代表表示，尽管供应商难以跟上旅行需求的反弹，但他们对航空业持乐观态度。
item.author: Xinghui Kok

item.title: 报告称中国“龙”婴儿潮可能会在2024年增加人口
item.description: More babies are being born in hospitals across China in the Year of the Dragon, financial news outlet Yicai reported, an increase which could soften the decline in population in 2024 and bring cheer to policymakers.翻译:据财经新闻媒体第一财经报道，龙年中国各地的医院将有更多婴儿出生，这一增长可能会缓解 2024 年人口下降的趋势，并给政策制定者带来欢呼。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于梅西的影响，中国取消了比赛，阿根廷转而与美国进行友谊赛
item.description: Argentina will play two matches in the United States next month after Chinese sporting authorities cancelled friendlies featuring the World Cup champions amid a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in an Inter Miami match in Hong Kong.翻译:阿根廷队将于下个月在美国进行两场比赛，此前中国体育当局取消了与世界杯冠军队的友谊赛，原因是梅西未能参加在香港举行的迈阿密国际队的比赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 渣打银行宣布大规模回购，首席执行官哀叹股价“糟糕”
item.description: Standard Chartered PLC Chief Executive Bill Winters on Friday acknowledged the bank's underwhelming share price and vowed to fix it as the lender announced increased dividends, a fresh $1 billion buyback and an 18% increase in annual profit.翻译:渣打银行 (Standard Chartered PLC) 首席执行官比尔·温特斯 (Bill Winters) 周五承认该行股价低迷，并誓言要解决这个问题，该银行宣布增加股息、新一轮 10 亿美元回购以及年度利润增长 18%。
item.author: Selena Li, Lawrence White

item.title: 中国高速公路结冰 百车连环连环相撞 多人受伤
item.description: Several people were injured after more than 100 cars collided into each other on an icy stretch of an expressway in the Chinese city of Suzhou, state media reported on Friday, the latest accident caused by extreme weather conditions.翻译:据官方媒体周五报道，中国苏州市一条高速公路结冰路段发生一百多辆汽车相撞事故，造成多人受伤，这是极端天气条件引发的最新一起事故。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 外国首次亮相，但新加坡航展上几乎没有国防交易
item.description: The Singapore Airshow included the foreign debuts of new weapons systems, growing interest in systems that could destroy ballistic missiles and swat down drones - but it was missing any Russian presence and major defence deals were scarce.翻译:新加坡航展包括新武器系统在国外的首次亮相，人们对能够摧毁弹道导弹和击落无人机的系统越来越感兴趣，但它没有看到任何俄罗斯的存在，而且重大国防交易也很少。
item.author: Gerry Doyle

item.title: 新西兰重新评估南极基地的检修提议
item.description: New Zealand is reassessing a proposed overhaul of its Antarctica base after negotiations with a construction firm reached a deadlock due to budget issues, the government agency responsible for the country's Antarctic operations said on Friday.翻译:负责新西兰南极运营的政府机构周五表示，由于预算问题，新西兰与一家建筑公司的谈判陷入僵局，正在重新评估对其南极洲基地的拟议检修。
item.author: Lucy Craymer

item.title: 立法者称，美国针对中国生物技术公司的法案可能更加“狭隘”
item.description: A bill in the U.S. Congress targeting Chinese biotech companies may end up being more "narrowly tailored", the U.S. lawmaker who proposed it said on Friday, adding that he was cautiously optimistic something could be passed this year.翻译:提出该法案的美国议员周五表示，美国国会针对中国生物技术公司的一项法案最终可能会更加“狭隘”，并补充说他对今年可能通过的法案持谨慎乐观态度。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 独家：中国警察在夏威夷太平洋邻国基里巴斯工作
item.description: Chinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a Pacific Ocean neighbour of Hawaii, with uniformed officers involved in community policing and a crime database program, Kiribati officials told Reuters.翻译:基里巴斯官员告诉路透社，中国警察正在偏远的环礁国家基里巴斯工作，基里巴斯是夏威夷的太平洋邻国，身穿制服的警察参与社区治安和犯罪数据库项目。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 股市沐浴在科技狂热和英伟达的繁荣之中
item.description: Global stock markets are on course on Friday for a week of heady gains as AI darling Nvidia's stunning results sparked a wave of record highs from Asia to Europe and the U.S., while the yen nursed losses on a range of currencies.翻译:随着人工智能宠儿英伟达令人惊叹的业绩引发从亚洲到欧洲和美国的一波创纪录高点，全球股市周五将迎来一周的强劲上涨，而日元则导致一系列货币下跌。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 货币交易者继续做空，日元下跌
item.description: The yen sagged on the euro, sterling and other crosses this week and headed for a fourth weekly drop against the dollar on Friday as investors chased better yields just about everywhere else, wagering Japan's rates would stay near zero for some time.翻译:日元兑欧元、英镑和其他交叉货币本周下跌，周五兑美元汇率将连续第四周下跌，因为投资者在其他地方都在追逐更好的收益率，押注日本利率将在一段时间内保持在接近于零的水平。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车将稀释电动汽车制造商 Polestar 的股份
item.description: Volvo Cars said on Friday it plans to distribute 62.7% of its stake worth 9.5 billion crowns ($920.17 million) in Swedish electric vehicle manufacturer Polestar Automotive Holding to its own shareholders.翻译:沃尔沃汽车周五表示，计划将其持有的瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar Automotive Holding 价值 95 亿克朗（合 9.2017 亿美元）的 62.7% 股份分配给自己的股东。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达在文件中首次将华为列为最大竞争对手
item.description: Nvidia identified Huawei as a top competitor in several categories, including artificial intelligence chips, for the first time in a filing with the Securities and Exchange commission late Wednesday.翻译:英伟达在周三晚间向美国证券交易委员会提交的文件中首次将华为列为人工智能芯片等多个类别的最大竞争对手。
item.author: Max Cherney, Stephen Nellis

item.title: 日本在芯片复兴的漫长道路上伸出援助之手
item.description: Chipmaker TSMC formally opens its first Japanese plant on Saturday, highlighting the Taiwanese firm's critical role in Tokyo's multi-billion dollar efforts to reboot its once-mighty semiconductor manufacturing industry.翻译:芯片制造商台积电于周六正式开设第一家日本工厂，凸显这家台湾公司在东京斥资数十亿美元重启其曾经强大的半导体制造业的努力中发挥的关键作用。
item.author: Sam Nussey, Miho Uranaka

item.title: Booking Holdings 因亚洲需求复苏而超出第四季度利润预期
item.description: Online travel agent Booking Holdings beat analysts' expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, driven by a strong recovery in Asian markets.翻译:受亚洲市场强劲复苏的推动，在线旅行社 Booking Holdings 周四第四季度利润超出分析师预期。
item.author: Kannaki Deka, Aishwarya Jain

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着全球股市的繁荣，记录被打破
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 最后时刻的乌龙球让伊蒂哈德队进入全沙特亚冠四分之一决赛
item.description: Toma Tabatadze's late own goal spared Karim Benzema's blushes as the defender gifted Saudi Arabia's Al-Ittihad a 2-1 win over Navbahor of Uzbekistan on Thursday to set up an Asian Champions League quarter-final meeting with compatriots Al-Hilal.翻译:周四，托马·塔巴塔泽最后时刻的乌龙球让卡里姆·本泽马免于脸红，这名后卫帮助沙特阿拉伯的伊蒂哈德队以 2-1 战胜了乌兹别克斯坦队的纳纳巴霍尔，并在亚冠四分之一决赛中与同胞希拉尔队进行了比赛。
item.author: Michael Church
